description: Investigate suspicious payments with Radar risk signals, early fraud warnings, disputes, and refund history. Mitigate losses by issuing full or partial refunds fast. Go beyond the basics by tapping any Stripe API resource when you need custom actions.

log_level.description: Minimum log level emitted by the server (default: info).

stripe_api_key.description: Stripe secret API key (sk_live_... or sk_test_...).

stripe_api_version.description: Optional Stripe API version override (e.g., 2024-06-20). Leave undefined to use your account default.

default_stripe_account.description: Optional default connected account ID. Used when stripe_raw_request omits stripe_account.

capabilities.name: stripe_status
capabilities.description: Returns server health information and validates Stripe API connectivity.

capabilities.name: stripe_fraud_insight
capabilities.description: Fetches Radar risk data, early fraud warnings, disputes, and refunds for a payment.

capabilities.name: stripe_create_refund
capabilities.description: Creates a refund for a charge or payment intent, supporting partial refunds and metadata.

capabilities.name: stripe_raw_request
capabilities.description: Direct access to any Stripe REST endpoint using the authenticated SDK client.
